Talk about a mistake you recently made.

column3: what would you do with the extra time?

column2: If you suddenly lost 2 hours every day (a 22 hour day)
column3: what would you cut out of your current schedule to accommodate for the lost time?

column2: Assume you have absolutely NO restrictions and you could live anywhere in the world. Where would you live and why? What restrictions did you have to “remove” from your thought process in order to live there?

column3: cover to cover? Why did you read it? What did you learn from it? Would you recommend it to others?
